# [Interview #1041: Spokane Signing Report - theofficetroll, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1041#4)

#### Brandon Sanderson

Odium's presence is felt on Roshar, but he is on Braize, the 3rd planet in the system.
